partnerDetails.about:
Consulting, Development, Implementation
Real added value for your company: For more than 20 years, COSATEQ stands for innovative and highly efficient solutions in the fields of real-time simulation, hardware, and control technology. Thanks to our mature and reliable systems, you can significantly reduce your development and production costs - a clear competitive advantage.

Our approach distinguishes us from many software developers: We process requirements with our own mathematically based solutions. The result is not just source code, but a complete package consisting of software and hardware right through to the fully wired control cabinet - all perfectly coordinated and adapted to your existing environment.
This is made possible by our team of engineers, technicians, software specialists and other experts. Together, we create well thought-out solutions that help you bring your products to market as quickly as possible. We always distinguish ourselves by a maximum of engineering competence, distinctive quality thinking, and absolute reliability.

Costumers trust in our competence and individual solutions
We are successful only when you are satisfied. That's why COSATEQ develops real innovations and forward-looking technologies that inspire your success. 

  • Control engineering
  • PLC programming
  • Test bench technology & real-time/hardware-in-the-loop simulation 
  • Software engineering / data science
  • Artificial Intelligence / machine learning / predicitive maintenance
  • Internet of things
...are important driving forces for the economy - and they are our passion.

Perfect combination of theory, control technology and application
Renowned customers from various industries rely on COSATEQ's convincing products and services. Among them are the big names from mechanical and engine engineering, IT, aerospace, automotive industry, measurement technology, medicine, production automation as well as renowned organisations from research and education.

Commissioning included
On request, we will install the developed software and hardware solution including control cabinet at your plant on site and guarantee trouble-free commissioning. Because we do not only have a strong and always up-to-date theoretical knowledge, but also the necessary commissioning competence.
